backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a personal productivity app with user profiles, studies, work items, habits, and goals, using access control and persistent storage with Map and Set data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the addition of 'Made by Akshita Tiwari' credit text in the Layout component footer with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the MOMENTUM productivity app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining design tokens for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the MOMENTUM app with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, dashboard, studies, work, habits, and goals pages, plus authentication and profile setup logic.
frontend/src/components/DashboardCard.ts: Reusable card component for dashboard displaying section title, item count, icon with gradient background, and navigation link with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/GoalCard.tsx: Card component displaying goal details including title, description, target date, progress bar, milestones checklist, and completion status badge.
frontend/src/components/GoalForm.tsx: Dialog form for creating goals with title, description, target date picker, and dynamic milestones array with add/remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Card component displaying habit with name, description, weekly frequency target, 7-day tracking checkboxes, completion count, and streak badge with flame icon.
frontend/src/components/HabitForm.tsx: Dialog form component for creating new habits with fields for name, description, and weekly frequency target (1-7 times). Uses React Hook Form pattern and mutation hook for submission.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component with sticky header navigation, authenticated route links (Dashboard, Studies, Work, Habits, Goals), and footer with branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that toggles between login/logout states using Internet Identity, with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for name input and cannot be dismissed until completed.
frontend/src/components/StudyCard.tsx: Card component displaying study subject details including name, description, progress percentage with visual progress bar, and study schedule.
frontend/src/components/StudyForm.tsx: Dialog form for adding new study subjects with fields for subject name, description, study schedule, and initial progress slider (0-100%).
frontend/src/components/WorkCard.tsx: Card component for work items showing project name, description, deadline with calendar icon, completion status, and dynamic badges for overdue/upcoming deadlines.
frontend/src/components/WorkForm.tsx: Dialog form for creating work items with project name, description, and deadline date picker that enforces minimum date of today.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoals.ts: Provides hooks for fetching goals list and adding new goals with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useHabits.ts: Provides hooks for fetching habits list and adding new habits with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: React Query mutation hook for saving the current user's profile and invalidating the profile cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudies.ts: Provides hooks for fetching studies list and adding new studies with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkItems.ts: Provides hooks for fetching work items (sorted by deadline) and adding new work items with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using warm coral, amber, and teal color palette with OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider wrapper around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying overview cards for studies, work items, habits, and goals with loading states and quick tips section.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Goals management page with tabbed view for active and completed goals, add goal button, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/Habits.tsx: Habits page component that displays a grid of habit cards, handles loading states, shows an empty state with call-to-action, and provides a button to open the HabitForm modal for adding new habits.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero section, feature grid showcasing Studies/Work/Habits/Goals modules, and a call-to-action button for Internet Identity login; redirects authenticated users to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Studies.tsx: Studies page component that displays a grid of study subject cards, handles loading states, shows an empty state with call-to-action, and provides a button to open the StudyForm modal for adding new studies.
frontend/src/pages/Work.tsx: Work page component that displays work items in a tabbed interface (Active/Completed), shows counts for each tab, handles loading and empty states, and provides a button to open the WorkForm modal for adding new work items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space (coral, amber, teal), container settings, border radius variables, Inter font family, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a life management web platform called MOMENTUM for young people, with features for studies, work, habits, goals, and Internet Identity authentication. Contains architectural notes, existing features, requirements, and file structure metadata.
